title: View which rows were manually updated
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps:
WHEN the user manually updates a Player's Details in the Payroll section of the utility 
AND clicked Save
custom_expected: THEN a green check will appear in the Manually Changed Column in View mode

title: View Reset button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has manually made changes to a Player's Details in a Payroll report 
AND has saved those changes
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected: THEN a Reset button will appear in the rows that were manually edited

title: Add multiple players to new Cash Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing a Cash Transaction
AND user has clicked "Add Transaction" to launch popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount
AND a dropdown that contains the same population of players that is contained in the "Add player" modal, along with their current Org/Club (if any) and roster status, is available
AND "Add Row" button is available in the modal
custom_steps: WHEN user Clicks Add Row button
custom_expected: THEN system should add an additional player dropdown to the modal with the same population of players

title: Remove multiple players from a new Cash Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing a Cash Transaction
AND one or more players has already been added to the transaction
AND trash can icon is visible on each row associated with a player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN system should remove the row and associated player from the modal
AND clicking "Add Transaction" should close the modal, and add the transaction details, along with a semicolon separated list of player names to the Cash Transactions table
AND players should appear as Last, Roster First

title: Use Opening Day Saved Special Rosters as player population on CBT Reports
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a MN player to the ML roster 
AND has created a contract for the player
custom_steps: WHEN the player saves the Opening day rosters
custom_expected: THEN the player will appear in the Payroll report utility

title: Remove player that was manually added from Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
AND each row in Payroll section of the report for both CBT and LRD have a trash can icon available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN system should flag the player as being removed from the report if they were not manually added to the report
AND system should remove the players that were manually added to the report from the utility
AND the delete should not be effective until the payroll report has been saved
AND the deleted player(s) should NOT display in the actual report

title: Edit Players associated with existing Cash Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is viewing the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode 
AND there is at least one cash transaction in the Cash Transactions table
AND an "Edit Players" button is available for each populated row
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit Players"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal that displays relevant cash transaction information in view mode, along with a list of players that currently exist in entered transaction
AND each player should appear in their own dropdown
AND the dropdown should have the same population as that of the Add Player modal
AND if more than one row exists, there should be a trash can icon for each row
BUT if only one row exists, there should be no trash can icon
AND clicking the trash can icon should remove the associated row from the modal
AND user should see an "Add Row" button that should add additional rows of players when clicked
AND the modal should have an Update button and a Cancel button
AND clicking cancel should cancel any of the changes made, close the modal and return the user to the payroll report utility in edit mode
AND the update button should not be enabled until each of the currently entered rows has a player selected
AND clicking update should close the modal and return the user to the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode, with the updated list of players displayed in the Cash Transactions utility
AND no edits should be saved until the entire report is saved

title: View Cash Transactions in Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the header filter is set to LRD or CBT
custom_expected:
THEN Cash Transactions section of the Forecast report will display 
AND will be sorted by Payor, then Payee and then transaction date 

IF no cash transactions exist hide the table headers and show "No cash transactions"

title: See total value of displayed Cash Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user is viewing Cash Transactions section of Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user sets "Show" to either LRD or CBT
custom_expected:
THEN Total Cash Transactions should display in Cash Transactions section
AND total should be calculated correctly per ebis1, taking into account all of the values entered into the utility
AND total should be recalculated on load of the report taking into account the selected filters, and on Save

title: Edit Payroll Forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing Payroll Forecast Utility
AND edit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit button
custom_expected:
THEN system should reload the form in edit mode
AND all of the filters should become disabled
AND the "View" button at the top of the page should also be disabled or not display
AND Payroll details section should be displayed in edit mode, per the wireframe
AND the only values that should not be editable in the Payroll details are the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed
(Additional values that cannot be edited are detailed in the story #125729051.LABELS)

title: Add new Cash Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Add Transaction" button is displayed beneath the Cash Transactions portion of the utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Transaction"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction
AND an "Add Transaction" button should become enabled when all of the required fields have been entered properly
AND clicking this "Add Transaction" button should close modal, and populate Cash Transaction table of BOTH LRD and CBT payroll report utility with cash transaction information for selected Org
AND the reverse of the transaction shhould also be added to the counterpart's cash transactions table so that for one it appears as a positive, and the other as a negative. (Ex: If Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000, then ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added)
AND if the filter is set to "All" then the cash transaction should only be displayed once

title: Save changes to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
AND "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should save all of the entered values, and reload the utility in View mode
AND successful blue notification should display

title: Cancel changes to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Cancel" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN system should ask the user to confirm that they wish to lose any edits that have been made to the utility
AND confirming should cancel out any edits that have been made since the utility was placed into edit mode 
AND the utility should be reloaded in view mode

title: See total Forecasted CBT Payroll excluding Cash Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Payroll Section of Payroll Forecast Utility 
AND sets "Show" to "CBT"
custom_expected:
THEN Forecasted CBT Payroll (Excluding Cash) should display under the Payroll section
AND Total should be calculated correctly per ebis1, taking into account all of the values entered into the utility
AND Total should be recalculated on generation of the report, and on Save

title: View which rows have been manually updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND changes to a player's details have been manually modified in the Payroll section of Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Section of Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a "Reset" button should appear in the row associated with the player whose details were changed 
AND once changes have been saved a green check should appear in view mode

title: Revert back to calculated values for manually modified rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND details for one or more players have been manually modified in Payroll section of Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN "Reset" button should be available for any row has been manually modified (not including added or deleted)
AND clicking the reset button should restore the originally calculated values for the selected player
AND the change should not take effect until the Payroll Forecast utility is actually saved

title: Add player to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user has navigated to Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Add Player" button is available underneath the Payroll section of CBT or LRD Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal
AND Player dropdown should match the population of Quick Search
AND the "Add/Trade Player" button should be disabled until all required fields have been entered
AND he Cancel button should always be available
AND  when"Cancel" is clicked system should dismiss the modal without making any changes to the Payroll Report
AND when "Add/Trade Player" is clicked, the player and the information added for him, should be added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report
AND the manually changed column should read "Added" in both view and edit mode

title: Remove a player from Payroll Forecast Utility - player NOT manually added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user has navigated to Payroll section of the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND a trash can icon is available in each row in the Payroll section for both  CBT and LRD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the trash can icon on a row for a player
AND player was NOT manually added to the report
custom_expected:
THEN system should flag the player as being removed from the report 
AND in the utility, the player should remain in the Payroll section, 
BUT player should be greyed out
AND the trash can icon should be replaced with a "Return" button in edit mode
AND "Deleted" should appear in the "Manually Changed" column in both view and edit mode
AND the delete should not be effective until the payroll report has been saved
AND the deleted player should remain visible in the utility, 
BUT player should NOT display in the actual report
AND

title: Remove a player from Payroll Forecast Utility - player manually added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user has navigated to Payroll section of the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND a trash can icon is available in each row in the Payroll section for both CBT and LRD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the trash can icon on a row for a player
AND player was manually added to the report
custom_expected:
THEN system should remove the player from the utility
AND the delete should not be effective until the payroll report has been saved
AND the deleted player(s) should NOT display in the actual report

title: See "Agent/Agency" tab in Utilities Dashboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that has any agent or agency permissions is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Utilities"
custom_expected:
THEN system should load the Utilities dashboard
AND An "Agent/Agency" tab should be available on the Utilities dashboard 
AND clicking on the Agent/Agency tab should load the tab and display the Agents and Agencies widgets
